00D34C 4310 8003            00003 17730+         IC    R1,SCVRTPRN             GET RECORD NUMBER                09550030
00D350 0610                       17731+         BCTR  R1,R0                   DECREMENT BY ONE  R-1            09600030
00D352 9180 8000      00000       17732+         TM    SCVRTPDL,SCVRTPVL       ARE RECORDS VARIABLE             09650030
00D356 4710 90C4      0D3A0       17733+         BO    SCVRTVLR                YES, USE TOTAL BYTES             09700030
00D35A 4330 8002            00002 17734+         IC    R3,SCVRTPKL             NO, PICK UP KEY LENGTH           09750030
00D35E 4A30 8000            00000 17735+         AH    R3,SCVRTPDL             ADD DATA LENGTH -KL+DL           09800030
00D362 1C21                       17736+         MR    R2,R1                   R3 = (R-1)(KL+DL)                09850030
00D364 1803                       17737+         LR    R0,R3                   SAVE RESULT                      09900030


                                  17739+***************************************************************         10000030
                                  17740+*        GET BLOCK OVERHEAD FOR KEYED OR NON-KEYED RECORDS    *         10050030
                                  17741+*          AND MULTIPLY THE OVERHEAD BY RECORD NUMBER MINUS   *         10100030
                                  17742+*          ONE  (KO+BO)(R-1). THEN ADD R0 OVERHEAD TO RESULT. *         10150030
                                  17743+***************************************************************         10200030
                            0D366 17744+SCVRTOVH EQU   *                                                        10250030
00D366 1B33                       17745+         SR    R3,R3                   RE-CLEAR WORK REG                10300030
00D368 9500 8002      00002       17746+         CLI   SCVRTPKL,ZERO           ARE RECORDS KEYED                10350030
00D36C 4780 9098      0D374       17747+         BE    SCVRTNOK                NO, DON'T ADD KEY OVHD           10400030
00D370 4330 4006            00006 17748+         IC    R3,DDTKO                YES, GET KEY OVERHEAD            10450030
                                  17749+***************************************************************         10475030
                                  17750+*        R3 HAS KEY OVERHEAD IF KEYED RECORDS OR ZERO IF NO   *         10480030
                                  17751+*          KEYS.                                              *         10485030
                                  17752+***************************************************************         10490030
                            0D374 17753+SCVRTNOK EQU   *                                                        10500030
00D374 4A30 4004            00004 17754+         AH    R3,DDTBO                ADD BLOCK OVERHEAD               10550030
00D378 1C21                       17755+         MR    R2,R1                   MULT. BY NUM RECS-1              10600030
00D37A 4A30 4002            00002 17756+         AH    R3,DDTR0                ADD R0 OVERHEAD                  10650030


                                  17758+***************************************************************         10750030
                                  17759+*        ADD TOTAL DATA LENGTH TO TOTAL OVERHEAD LENGTH AND   *         10800030
                                  17760+*          MULTIPLY BY NUMBER OF SECTORS DIVIDED BY TRACK     *         10850030
                                  17761+*          CAPACITY.                                          *         10900030
                                  17762+*          (((KL+DL+KO+BO)(R-1)+R0)*S)/TC                     *         10950030
                                  17763+***************************************************************         11000030
                            0D37E 17764+SCVRTTOT EQU   *                                                        11050030
00D37E 1A30                       17765+         AR    R3,R0                   ADD DATA TO OVERHEAD             11100030
00D380 1B11                       17766+         SR    R1,R1                   ZERO A WORK REGISTER             11150030
00D382 4310 4007            00007 17767+         IC    R1,DDTNS                GET NUM OF SECTORS               11200030
00D386 1C21                       17768+         MR    R2,R1                   MULT TOT BY NUM SECTS            11250030
00D388 4810 4000            00000 17769+         LH    R1,DDTTC                GET THE TRACK CAPACITY           11300030
00D38C 1D21                       17770+         DR    R2,R1                   GET SECTOR VALUE                 11310030
00D38E 1803                       17771+         LR    R0,R3                   PUT RESULT IN REG 0              11350030
00D390 1B22                       17772+         SR    R2,R2                   ZERO OUT A WORK REG              11357530
00D392 4320 4007            00007 17773+         IC    R2,DDTNS                GET NUM SECTORS PER TRACK        11359030
00D396 1932                       17774+         CR    R3,R2                   VALID SECTOR NUMBER              11360030
00D398 0745                       17775+         BCR   L,R5                    YES, RETURN                      11370030
                                  17776+***************************************************************         11371030
                                  17777+*        FOR INVALID DEVICE OR A CALCULATED SECTOR VALUE THAT *         11371130
                                  17778+*          IS TOO HIGH, A SECTOR VALUE OF X'FF' IS RETURNED   *         11373330
                                  17779+*          TO THE USER.  THIS CAUSES A SET SECTOR COMMAND TO  *         11374330
                                  17780+*          EXECUTE AS A NO-OP.                                *         11375330

       DOS SUPERVISOR  SGSCVRT SECTOR CONVERT ROUTINE                                                         PAGE   426


  LOC  OBJECT CODE    ADDR1 ADDR2  STMT   SOURCE STATEMENT                      DOS/VS ASSEMBLER REL 34.0 14.38 77-05-09

                                  17781+***************************************************************         11375630
                            0D39A 17782+SCVRTERR EQU   *                                                        11377830
00D39A 4100 00FF            000FF 17783+         LA    R0,XFF                  CAUSE SET SECT TO NOOP           11380030
00D39E 07F5                       17784+         BR    R5                      RETURN TO CALLER                 11400030


                                  17786+***************************************************************         11500030
                                  17787+*        FOR VARIABLE LENGTH RECORDS, THE TOTAL AMOUNT OF     *         11550030
                                  17788+*          DATA USED UP TO THE CURRENT RECORD IS PASSED BY    *         11600030
                                  17789+*          THE CALLER.  THE INDICATOR IS TURNED OFF AND THE   *         11650030
                                  17790+*          TOTAL BYTES IS USED AS THE KL+DL.  RETURN TO       *         11700030
                                  17791+*          MAINLINE WILL CONTINUE WITH OVERHEAD CALCULATION.  *         11750030
                                  17792+***************************************************************         11800030
                            0D3A0 17793+SCVRTVLR EQU   *                                                        11850030
00D3A0 947F 8000      00000       17794+         NI    SCVRTPDL,XFF-SCVRTPVL   RESET VLR INDICATOR              11900030
00D3A4 4800 8000            00000 17795+         LH    R0,SCVRTPDL             GET DATA LENGTH                  11950030
00D3A8 47F0 908A      0D366       17796+         B     SCVRTOVH                GO DETERMINE OVERHEAD            12000030


                                  17798+***************************************************************         12100030
                                  17799+*        DEVICE TABLE FOR RPS TYPE DEVICES                    *         12150030
                                  17800+***************************************************************         12200030
00D3AC                            17801+DDT3330  DS    0H                      3330 CHARACTERISTICS             12250030
00D3AC 3480                       17802+         DC    H'13440'                TRACK CAPACITY                   12300030
00D3AE 00ED                       17803+         DC    H'237'                  R0 OVERHEAD                      12350030
00D3B0 0087                       17804+         DC    H'135'                  BLOCK OVERHEAD                   12400030

                                  18389+*  IF AN UNCHAINED SEEK DUE TO SEEKSEP, I/O IS STARTED WITHOUT ANY      37550034
                                  18390+* TEST WITH RESPECT TO DASD FILE PROTECT.                               37600034
                                  18391+* NOW TESTS ARE PERFORMED TO SEE IF IT IS AN I/O/ REQUEST WHERE         37700034
                                  18392+* DASD FILE PROTECTION HAS TO BE CHECKED. IF IT IS A SUPERVISOR REQUEST 37750034
                                  18393+* OR A REQUEST FOR A NON DASD DEVICE OR IF THERE IS AN ERROR IN ERP OR  37800034
                                  18394+* IF SYSRES WRITE IS ALLOWED OR IT IS A SINGLE SEEK,  I/O IS STARTED AS 37850034
                                  18395+* SOON AS POSSIBLE.                                                     37900034

       DOS SUPERVISOR     SGIOS     CHANNEL SCHEDULER ROUTINE                                                 PAGE   439


  LOC  OBJECT CODE    ADDR1 ADDR2  STMT   SOURCE STATEMENT                      DOS/VS ASSEMBLER REL 34.0 14.38 77-05-09

                                  18396+* IF IT IS A SYSTEM FILE A BRANCH TO SYSFILE LABEL IS TAKEN AND NO      38000034
                                  18397+* DASD FILE PROTECT CHECKING IS PERFORMED                               38050034
                                  18398+* OTHERWISE DASD FILE PROTECT CHECKING IS PERFORMED :                   38150034
                                  18399+* EVERY DASD PROTECTED CHANNEL CORRESPONDS TO A STRING OF 3 CCW;S:      38200034
                                  18400+* ONE SEEK, ONE SET FILE MASK, AND ONE TIC TO THE USER CCW STRING.      38250034
                                  18401+* THE SET FILE MASK NORMALLY INDICATES THAT SEEKS IN THE STRING ARE     38300034
                                  18402+* FORBIDDEN. HOWEVER FOR SYSRES, IT INDICATES THAT WRITE ON SYSRES IS   38350034
                                  18403+* NOT ALLOWED FOR A NON SYSRES DASD DEVICE. THE SEEK ADDRESS IS CHECKED 38400034
                                  18404+* WITH HELP OF THE JIB ENTRIES FOR THAT DEVICE. IF THE SEEK ADDRESS     38450034
                                  18405+* LIES OUTSIDE THE LIMITS OF THE EXTENTS, GIVEN IN THE JIB ENTRIES, AN  38500034
                                  18406+* ERROR MESSAGE WILL BE GENERATED AND THE SEEK IS NOT PERFORMED.        38550034

                                  20077+*                                                                     * 00827034

                                  20080+**********************************************************************  00863034
                                  20081+* SVC06 AND READY CANCELCODES ROUTINE:                                * 00872034
                                  20082+*                  PUT CANCELCODE IN PIB (IF MAINTASK CANCELED OR       00881034
                                  20083+*                  SUBTASK CANCELED,CANCELCODE TO ALL PIBS BELONGING    00900034
                                  20084+*                  TO PARTITION. ). ACTIVATE TASK(S) UNLESS TASK IS     00909034
                                  20085+*                  WAITING FOR I/O.  IF CANCEL WAS ALREADY IN           00918034
                                  20086+*                  PROGRESS FOR A TASK, CANCELCODE IS NOT CHANGED AND   00927034
                                  20087+*                  TASK NOT ACTIVATED.                                  00936034
                                  20088+*                  CANCELCODES :                                        00945034
                                  20089+* SUBTASK ISSUED CANCEL     : CANCELCODE X'23'                          00954034
                                  20090+* SUBTASK ISSUED CANCEL ALL : CANCELCODE X'1C' TO ALL TASKS,HOWEVER THE 00963034
                                  20091+*                             TASK ISSUING CANCEL ALL GETS CC=X'23'.    00972034
                                  20092+* MAINTASK ISSUED CANCEL WITH SUBS ATTACHED: CANCELCODE X'17' TO MAIN   00981034
                                  20093+*                                            CANCELCODE X'1D' SUBTASKS  01000034
                                  20094+* MAINTASK ISSUED CANCEL WITHOUT SUBS ATTACHED: CANCELCODE X'23'        01008034
                                  20095+*                                                                       01016034
                                  20096+* EXIT IS VIA R6 TO TASK SELECTION                                      01024034
                                  20097+*  REGISTER USAGE :                                                     01032034
                                  20098+*  R0 TO INDICATE SIMPLE CANCEL OR CANCEL ALL                           01050034
                                  20099+*  R3 IS BRANCH REGISTER OR BAL REGISTER                                01058034
                                  20100+*  R4 SETUP IN MAINTASK/SUBTASK SUBROUTINE TO CONTAIN PIBPOINTER        01066034
                                  20101+*  R5 USED IN MAINTASK/SUBTASK SUBROUTINE                               01074034
                                  20102+*  R7 BAL REGISTER AND EXIT REGISTER OUT OF SUBTASK SUBROUTINE          01082034

                                  20181+*********************************************************************** 02000034
                                  20182+* CNCEL OR ABNORMAL TERMINATION ROUTINE                               * 02008034
                                  20183+*********************************************************************** 02016034


                                  20185+*  CNCEL ROUTINE IS ENTERED IF TASK WANTS TO CANCEL.           @D33DDJO 02032034
                                  20186+*  IF CNCEL IS REENTERED WHILE THE USER'S AB ROUTINE IS ALREADY@D33DDJO 02058034
                                  20187+*  IN PROGRESS (ABINPR=1) THE TASK'S ENTRY IN ABTAB IS CLEARED @D33DDJO 02066034
                                  20188+*  AND THE ORIGINAL CANCEL CODE IS RESTORED.                   @D33DDJO 02074034
                                  20189+*  THE USER'S AB EXIT ROUTINE IS NOT ENTERED A SECOND TIME.    @D33DDJO 02082034
                                  20190+*  IF TASK TO BE CANCELED IS A MAIN TASK WITH SUBTASKS ATTACHED@D33DDJO 02107034
                                  20191+*  THE CANCEL CODE IS SET TO ALL TASKS OF THE PARTITION.       @D33DDJO 02114034
                                  20192+*  THE MAIN TASK IS SET IOBOUND.                               @D33DDJO 02130034
                                  20193+*  EXIT IS TO TASK SELECTION.( MAIN TASK IS CANCELED LAST.)    @D33DDJO 02137034
                                  20194+*                                                              @D33DDJO 02144034
                                  20195+*  IF TASK TO BE CANCELED IS A MAIN TASK WITHOUT SUBTASKS      @D33DDJO 02160034
                                  20196+*  ATTACHED OR A SUBTASK THEN:                                 @D33DDJO 02168034
                                  20197+*       IF NO AB ROUTINE IS PRESENT PROCESSING CONTINUES       @D33DDJO 02176034
                                  20198+*       WITH CANCEL ROUTINE ($$BEOJ3 OR $$BDUMP)  OR           @D33DDJO 02184034

                                  20200+*       IF AB ROUTINE IS PRESENT BUT NOT YET ACTIVE,           @D33DDJO 02208034
                                  20201+*       THE SAVE AREA CONTENT IS CHANGED TO POINT TO THE       @D33DDJO 02216034
                                  20202+*       USER'S AB ROUTINE. EXIT IS TO TASK SELECTION.          @D33DDJO 02224034
                                  20203+*       THE ABINPR BIT IN PIBFLG2 IS SET TO INDICATE           @D33DDJO 02232034
                                  20204+*       THAT THE USER AB ROUTINE IS IN PROGRESS.               @D33DDJO 02250034

                                  20305+*                                                                     * 03574034

                                  20501+**********************************************************************  05916034
                                  20502+* DETACH MACRO ROUTINE                           ********************** 05924034
                                  20503+**********************************************************************  05932034
                                  20504+* REGISTER 1 IS USED TO PASS A PARAMETER                                05950034
                                  20505+* THE CONTENTS OF R1 VARY FOR DIFFERENT TYPES OF DETACH                 05958034
                                  20506+* 1 - DETACH ISSUED BY A MAINTASK                                       05966034
                                  20507+*       R1 MUST CONTAIN POINTER TO SAVEAREA OF SUBTASK TO BE DETACHED   05974034
                                  20508+* IN THE FOLLOWING CASES THE CONTENTS OF R1 ARE IGNORED :               05982034
                                  20509+* 2 -  DETACH ISSUED BY SUBTASK                                         06000034
                                  20510+* 3 -  DETACH ISSUED BY TERMINATOR                                      06008034
                                  20511+* 4 -  DETACH FROM AB ROUTINE                                           06016034
                                  20512+*                                                                       06024034
                                  20513+* IN PRINCIPLE THE SAME ACTION IS TAKEN IN CASES 1,2, AND 3             06032034
                                  20514+* IF OUTSTANDING I/O, TERMINATOR IS FETCHED, OTHERWISE THE TASK IS      06050034
                                  20515+* DETACHED.                                                             06058034




00EE9E D500 0753 067F 00753 0067F 20517+SVC39    CLC   TIK+D1(L1),PIK+D1  DETACH ISSUED BY MAINTASK?   @DL28535 06074034
00EEA4 4770 D39C      0EEF2       20518+         BNE   ST$$DET .          NO, FROM SUBTASK OR TERMINATOR        06082034

                                  20520+* DETACH ISSUED BY MAINTASK                                             06108034
00EEA8 1211                       20521+         LTR   R1,R1 .            SAVE PARAMETER SPECIFIED?             06116034
00EEAA 4780 0A22      00A22       20522+         BZ    ERR21 .            NO, ILLEGAL SVC FROM MAINTASK         06124034
00EEAE 4121 007F            0007F 20523+         LA    R2,D127(R1) .      ENDING ADDRESS OF SAVE AREA           06250034
00EEB2 4580 B2F2            012F2 20524+         BAL   R8,VALID .         VALIDATE SAVE AREA ADDRESS            06258034
00EEB6 910F 1078      00078       20525+         TM    D120(R1),TIKMASK . VALID TIK FOR SUBTASK?                06266034
00EEBA 4770 0A22      00A22       20526+         BNZ   ERR21 .            NO, ILLEGAL SVC FROM MAINTASK         06274034
00EEBE 9550 1078      00078       20527+         CLI   D120(R1),HPIKMT .  TIK GT HIGHEST MAIN TASK ID? @DL01937 06282034
00EEC2 47D0 0A22      00A22       20528+         BNH   ERR21 .            NO, ILLEGAL SVC FROM MAINTSK @DL01937 06300034
00EEC6 1B22                       20529+         SR    R2,R2 .                                         @DL28535 06308034
00EEC8 4321 0078            00078 20530+         IC    R2,D120(R1) .      R2 CONTAINS TIK OF SUBTASK   @DL28535 06316034
                                  20531+* PROTECT SUBTASKS OF OTHER PARTITIONS                                  06332034
00EECC 4A20 06CC            006CC 20532+         AH    R2,YPIB2TAB .      POINT R2 TO PIB EXT. OF SUB  @DL28535 06350034
                                  20533+         DROP  RA                                                       06358034
                            00000 20534+         USING PIBADR,R2                                                06366034
00EED0 D501 067E 200C 0067E 0000C 20535+         CLC   PIK,PIBPIK .       SUBTASK BELONGS TO PARTITION?         06374034
00EED6 4770 0A22      00A22       20536+         BNE   ERR21 .            NO, ILLEGAL SVC                       06382034

00EEDA 4122 0100            00100 20538+         LA    R2,PIBTAB-PIB2TAB(R2) POINT R2 TO PIB OF SUBTASK     346 06408034
00EEDE 910C 200F      0000F       20539+         TM    PIBFLG2,CNCLD+FETCHEOJ SUBTSK ALREADY CANCELING @DM01248 06416034
00EEE2 0776                       20540+         BCR   NZ,R6 .            IGNORE DETACH                @DM01248 06424034
00EEE4 9210 2001      00001       20541+         MVI   PIBCNCL,NORMEOJ .  INDICATE DETACH REQUEST            FR 06432034
00EEE8 9601 2000      00000       20542+         OI    PIBFLG,IOCMPL .    READY TASK WHEN IO BOUND           FR 06450034
00EEEC 9608 200F      0000F       20543+         OI    PIBFLG2,FETCHEOJ . MARK FOR DETACH              @DM01248 06458034
00EEF0 07F6                       20544+         BR    R6 .               GOTO EXIT                          FR 06466034
                            00000 20545+         USING PIBADR,RA                                                06474034

                                  20547+* HANDLE FURTHER AS IF SUBTASK IS DETACHING. R3 CONTAINS THE TIK OF     06500034
                                  20548+* THE SUBTASK TO BE DETACHED.  THE TIK VALUE CONTAINS THE INTERRUPT     06508034
                                  20549+* KEY OF THE SUB TO BE DETACHED. RA POINTS TO SUBTASK PIB.              06516034


                                  20551+* WHEN SUBTASK OR TERMINATOR ISSUED DETACH, OPERAND WILL BE IGNORED     06532034

                                  20783+*********************************************************************** 09316034
                                  20784+* MAINTASK/SUBTASK SUBROUTINE : GIVE PIB  POINTERS TO                   09324034
                                  20785+*                               MAIN/SUB-TASK BELONGING TO PARTITION    09332034
                                  20786+* TWO ENTRYPOINTS:                                                      09350034
                                  20787+* MAINTASK : GIVE ON RETURN(R9) R4 POINTING TO PIBTABLE OF MAINTASK     09358034
                                  20788+*                               R5 POINTS TO MVCFLD OF TASK MINUS ONE   09366034
                                  20789+* SUBTASK  : ON ENTRY IT IS ASSUMED THAT R5 POINTS TO A MVCFLDBYTE      09374034
                                  20790+*            IT HAS TWO EXITS,DEPENDING DN THE MVCFLDBYTE:              09382034
                                  20791+*   1.MVCFLD BYTE CORRESPONDS TO A PIB BELONGING TO PARTITION:          09400034
                                  20792+*            RETURN VIA R9 : R4 POINTING TO PIB  OF TASK                09408034
                                  20793+*                            R5 ONE LESS THAN R5 ON ENTRY               09416034
                                  20794+*   2.MVCFLD BYTE DOES NOT CORRESPOND TO A PIB BELONGING TO PARTITION:  09424034
                                  20795+*            RETURN VIA R7 : REGISTER HAVE NOT BEEN MODIFIED            09432034
                                  20796+*                      REGISTER USAGE:                                  09450034
                                  20797+*                      R4,R5 ARE MODIFIED                               09458034
                                  20798+*                      R7,R9 ARE RETURN REGISTERS                       09466034
                                  20799+*********************************************************************** 09474034
00F10E 4150 B62A            0162A 20800+MAINTASK LA    R5,MVCFLD .        POINTER TO FIRST BYTE OF MVCFLD       09482034
00F112 4155 0001            00001 20801+FINDMAIN LA    R5,D1(R5) .        POINTER TO NEXT BYTE OF MVCFLD        09500034
00F116 D500 5000 067F 00000 0067F 20802+         CLC   D0(L1,R5),PIK+D1 . DOES TIK EQUAL PIK?                   09508034
00F11C 4770 D5BC      0F112       20803+         BNE   FINDMAIN .         NO, CONTINUE SCAN FOR MAINTASK        09516034
00F120 1B44                       20804+GETPIB   SR    R4,R4 .            - THESE THREE INSTRUCTIONS            09524034
00F122 4345 0000            00000 20805+         IC    R4,D0(R5) .        - POINT R4 TO THE PIB                 09532034
00F126 4A40 06AA            006AA 20806+         AH    R4,YPIBTAB .       - OF TASK WITH SAME PIK               09550034
00F12A 0650                       20807+         BCTR  R5,R0 .            POINT TO FOREGOING MVCFLD BYTE    435 09558034
00F12C 07F9                       20808+         BR    R9 .               RETURN                                09566034
00F12E 9550 5000      00000       20809+SUBTASK  CLI   D0(R5),HPIKMT .    STILL A SUBTASK OF PARTITION?         09574034
00F132 4720 D5CA      0F120       20810+         BH    GETPIB .           YES, GET PIB AND SAVE AREA ADDRESSES  09582034
00F136 07F7                       20811+         BR    R7 .               RETURN, ALL TASKS HAVE BEEN HAD       09600034

                                  20813+*********************************************************************** 09616034

                                  20815+*  UNWAIT ROUTINE                                                     * 09632034
                                  20816+*                                                                     * 09650034
                                  20817+*********************************************************************** 09658034


                                  20819+*********************************************************************** 09674034
                                  20820+* UNWAIT ROUTINE : ALL TASKS OF PARTITION OUT OF WAIT STATE IF THEY   * 09682034
                                  20821+*                  WAIT FOR ECB/RCB WHICH ADDRESS IS IN R1            * 09700034
                                  20822+* TWO ENTRYPOINTS :                                                   * 09708034
                                  20823+* UNWAIT : IF R1 POINTS TO ECB                                        * 09716034
                                  20824+* UNWTDEQ: IF R1 POINTS TO RCB (ENTRY FROM DEQUEUE ROUTINE)           * 09724034
                                  20825+*          EXIT IS ALWAYS VIA R7, IF ALL TASKS OF PARTITION HAVE BEEN * 09732034
                                  20826+*          INVESTIGATED, THIS EXIT IS TAKEN IN SUBTASK SUBROUTINE     * 09750034
                                  20827+*          IF TASK IS FOUND WAITING FOR RCB, WANTBIT IN RCB IS CLEARED* 09758034
                                  20828+*    REGISTER USAGE :                                                 * 09766034
                                  20829+*    R1 POINTS TO ECB/RCB                                             * 09774034
                                  20830+*    R2 INDICATES IF R1 POINTS TO ECB/RCB                             * 09782034
                                  20831+*    R4,R5,R9 ARE SET UP FOR  MAINTASK/SUBTASK SUBROUTINE             * 09800034
                                  20832+*    R7 IS RETURN REGISTER, THIS RETURN IS TAKEN IN SUBTASK           * 09808034
                                  20833+*       SUBROUTINE IF ALL SUBTASKS OF PARTITION HAVE BEEN HAD.        * 09816034
                                  20834+*********************************************************************** 09824034

                                  21393+*   GATING CONVENTION:                                         @D34XDJO 00358034
                                  21394+*   THE XECB SVC'S ARE GATED TO AVOID SIMULTANEOUS UPDATE      @D34XDJO 00366034
                                  21395+*   OF THE SUPERVISOR XECB TABLE.                              @D34XDJO 00374034
                                  21396+*   IF THE GATE IS CLOSED, CONTROL IS TRANSFERED TO THE        @D34XDJO 00382034
                                  21397+*   ROUTINE GATEWAIT, TO REISSUE THE SVC.                      @D34XDJO 00400034
                                  21398+*                                                              @D34XDJO 00408034
                                  21399+*   REGISTER CONVENTIONS:                                      @D34XDJO 00416034

                                  21570+* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  @D34XDJO 02150034
                                  21571+*   SVC 93:   XPOST                                            @D34XDJO 02158034
                                  21572+*   POST THE CROSS PARTITION ECB                               @D34XDJO 02166034
                                  21573+*   THIS SVC ROUTINE LOOKS FOR AN XECB NAME IN THE XECB TABLE. @D34XDJO 02174034
                                  21574+*   IF AN ENTRY IS FOUND, IT POSTS THE XECB                    @D34XDJO 02182034
                                  21575+*   AND POSTS THE WAITING TASK READY TO RUN.                   @D34XDJO 02200034
                                  21576+*   REGISTERS ON ENTRY:                                        @D34XDJO 02208034

                                  21586+*       4:   XECB TABLE ENTRY NOT FOUND                        @D34XDJO 02308034

                                  22352+*                  R4 IS THE WORKFIELD. IT ACTS AS AN ORDER    @D31DCAZ 32800034

                                  27066+*  SECTION 90.1 - PERMANENT AREA                                        00180030


                                  27068+*    THE FOLLOWING DUMMY SECTION DESCRIBES THE FORMAT AND               00200030
                                  27069+*    ORGANISATION OF THE POWER/VS PERMANENT AREA WHICH OCCUPIES         00210030
                                  27070+*    THE FIRST THREE PAGES OF THE POWER/VS PARTITION AND                00220030

                                  27124+*  SECTION 90.2 - RELOCATABLE CONSTANTS                                 00770030


                                  27126+*    ALL OF THE FOLLOWING CONSTANTS REQUIRE SOME FORM OF                00830030
                                  27127+*    RELOCATION AT POWER/VS START-UP TIME.  THE NECESSARY               00840030
                                  27128+*    RELOCATION IS PERFORMED BY THE INITIATOR TASK.                     00850030
